name: Zeta
description: She and Epsilon were personifications of two weaver stars who convinced the third star, Shokujo, that her husband Kengyu did not want to see her because he was only interested in younger and prettier girls. At their prompting, she sold watches with Sailor Moon on them to children in Azabu-Juban, then summoned the children to Ichinohashi Park while in disguise as Sailor Moon.

name: Jadeite (manga)
description: Jadeite has very short, closely cropped hair, and is the only member of the Shitennou who can boast this trait. It is colored as a very pale blonde and is parted off to the right-hand side of his head. His eye color is grey. Outside of his disguises, he is typically seen wearing his Shitennou uniform. His accent color is red.

description: Cyprine(シプリン, Shipurin) andPtilol(プチロル,Puchiroru) are the 5th members of theWitches 5. According to theMaterials Collection, the two of them are one, but when they fightPtilolwill split away from Cyprine. She is a level 999 witch and the most powerful member of the Witches 5. She also teaches the witch training class atMugen Academy.

name: Petz (manga)
description: Petz is named for the mineralpetzite, which is generally found with deposits of rare minerals such as gold and silver, as well as with copper.

description: Naruis written in the hiragana spelling for the Japanese word "become" or "to become, grow, attain, or reach" (なる,naru).

name: Rubeus (manga)
description: Rubeus has bright red hair, styled to look like a flame, and red eyes. Like all the Black Moon Clan, he has the black, upside-down crescent moon on his forehead and the black moon crystal earrings. He wears a brown leather vest, baggy pants with a camouflage-like design, black leather boots with laces, and a necklace with a stone pendant on it. TheMaterials' Collectiondescribes that his skin is a bit darker than Saphir's or Demande's. He is also seen carrying a jacket with the same camouflage...

name: Mii
description: In the manga, Mii has dark-colored hair tied into low pigtails, and she also carried a school bag. In crystal, Mii has brown hair tied into high pigtails and green eyes. She wore a light green blouse, a white knee-length skirt, white socks, and pink shoes, and carried a red school bag.

name: Calaveras (manga)
description: Calaveras(カラベラス, Karaberasu) is the second eldest of theSpectre Sisters, and a member of theBlack Moon Clan.

name: Morga (manga)
description: Revealing her true identity to Naru in a rather grisly manner, Morga continued to asphyxiate Naru and threatened to kill her mother as well, untilSailor Moonmakes her timely appearance at the store. In her true Youma form, Morga reawakened her affected humans to defend her. She is defeated after Sailor Moon's cry emitsSupersonic Wavesfrom herhair pieces, temporarily incapacitating Morga and the affected humans, giving her enough time to destroy Morga with herMoon Frisbee. Everyone in the jewe...

name: Natsuna Sakurada
description: Natsuna Sakurada(桜田 夏菜, Sakurada Natsuna) is a character who only appears in theCodename: Sailor VManga. She is the Superintendent-General of the Metropolitan Police Board and a closetSailor Vfan. She goes through many lengths to meet Sailor V and wants her to work side-by-side with her on the police force and she even keeps a signed poster of Sailor V that she looks at when no one is in her office.

attributes.First Manga Appearance: Chibiusa's Picture Diary Chapter 1 - Beware of the Transfer Student

name: Esmeraude (manga)
description: Green Esmeraude(翠のエスメロード,Midori no Esumerōdo)is an alien fromNemesisand a member of theBlack Moon Clan. She attacks by throwing dark energy balls, or by shooting bolts of dark energy.

attributes.Jobs: Member of the Black Moon Clan

name: Ittou Asanuma (manga)
description: Itto Asanuma(浅沼 一等,Asanuma Ittō) is a supporting character in the manga. He is a high school student who looks up toMamoru Chiba. In the Materials Collection, it is revealed that Asanuma has a home in Sendaikazue and is the only child of his family.

attributes.Affiliates: Mamoru Chiba Makoto Kino Kotono Sarashina

name: Ami's Father
description: The father ofAmi Mizuno. His actual name is never stated. He is a traveling artist who sends Ami paintings from time to time, and Ami appears to enjoy seeing the places he has traveled to. He has a small role in his daughter's life and she loves him, but she also resents him for leaving her mother in a time where divorce was still taboo in Japan. His appearance is only known from one volume of the manga, where Ami sees him in an illusion placed on her byFish Eye.

name: Cyber Girl Warrior Lurga
description: Cyber Girl Warrior Lurga has light hair in a similar style to Usagi and wears a mechanical headpiece with dangling earring like sections, odango style pieces and a tiara on her head. She wears a sleeveless swimsuit with dual shoulder pads, cuffs, a choker and heels.

attributes.First Manga Appearance: Vol.6 Showdown! Sailor V vs Cyber-Girl Warrior Lurga

name: Toshio Wakagi
description: He is a special officer of the Metropolitan Police Board branch in Tokyo, and his boss is closet-Sailor V fan,Natsuna Sakurada. He hates Sailor V because she makes the police look bad and takes all the credit for capturing the bad guys. Briefly, he is moved to the Siberian branch of the police force due to his failures. He somewhat mellows out on his return. He has an older brother who also hates Sailor V, but for different reasons.

attributes.Jobs: Special Officer of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police
attributes.First Manga Appearance: Vol.4 The Ambition of Petite Pandora
